hero.title: Hello! I am
hero.description: Peruvian Systems Engineer with residence in Chile üáµüá™üá®üá±, Senior Software Engineer with 6+ years transforming ideas into scalable technological solutions. Specialist in Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, and Enterprise Architectures. I lead technical teams, optimize systems processing millions of transactions, and develop digital transformation strategies that generate measurable ROI. Expert in Python, React, Machine Learning, and Cloud Computing with proven experience in unicorn startups and Fortune 500 companies.

hero.pitch: I transform complex business challenges into innovative technological solutions that scale. With expertise in AI/ML, distributed architectures, and technical leadership, I have optimized systems handling +1M users, reduced operational costs by 60%, and led teams delivering world-class products.
hero.value_proposition: I combine strategic vision with exceptional technical execution to create solutions that don't just work, but transform businesses.

testimonials.title: What my
testimonials.subtitle: Real results from companies that trusted my technological solutions

items.name: Patricia Morales
items.text: The e-commerce platform Emerson developed for Kefyto transformed our natural kefir business. Now we manage real-time orders with WhatsApp integration, and our sales increased 250% in the first quarter. The user experience is impeccable.

items.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
items.text: The management system for our Japanese restaurant completely modernized our operations. Real-time inventory control, table management and online reservations. We reduced errors by 85% and significantly improved our customers' experience.

items.name: Yuki Nakamura
items.text: The delivery platform he built for Hazuki Sushi integrates online orders, real-time tracking and a points system. Our customers are delighted with the ease of use and we're thrilled with the 180% increase in online orders.

items.name: Diego Ram√≠rez
items.text: Emerson led the development of Netmuz Social, the social network for musicians. A complex platform with event management, marketplace and professional networking. His technical vision and ability to solve complex challenges were fundamental to the project's success.

items.name: Sofia Mendoza
items.text: Learning programming with Emerson at CompilandoCode changed my career. His practical methodology and clear explanations helped me master React and Python. Today I work as a junior developer thanks to his teachings. The best teacher I've ever had.

items.name: Miguel Torres
items.text: Emerson's courses at CompilandoCode are incredible. I went from not knowing how to program to developing my own web application in 4 months. His focus on real projects and his patience in teaching are exceptional. 100% recommended.

items.name: Carlos Vega
items.text: The system he developed for our innovation lab allowed us to manage technological challenges, teams and evaluations in an integrated way. The platform is robust, scalable and exactly what we needed to drive innovation.

items.name: Ana L√≥pez
items.text: Emerson implemented a government registration and management system that modernized our processes. His professionalism, deadline compliance and technical capability were exceptional. The system works perfectly and has significantly improved our response times.

Proven track record architecting scalable solutions that process millions of transactions while reducing operational costs by 60%. Expert in AI/ML implementation, microservices architecture, and technical leadership. Successfully mentored 200+ developers with 95% placement rate in top-tier technology companies.
